sheet.text: Mm~ What a great breeze! Right, Carby?
Gugu~!
Going on a carefree walk with Carby is bliss...
Arly! So you were here?
Eh—
...UWAH! It's him!
Hahahaha!
It's your incredibly strong~ incredibly kind~ incredibly cool~
fiancé, the Great Satan. Are you that happy to see me?
What are you going on about this time?
And just when I was on a carefree walk with Carby...!
You're so cute, all embarrassed.
Today, I came to bring some happy♪ news!
"Happy"?
That's right.
At a place just a little ways from here...
For you, Arly, I've built a newlyweds' sweet home!
EEEHHHHH?!
A castle cased in thunderous storm, for my grand self and my queen. A lovely stage!
What a load of trouble...
Now, don't be shy, Arly. Let's live there together!
You are mine! I am yours!
DEEEFINITELY N-O-T!!
If you're going to act so willful,
I'll have to punish you juuust a little, you know?
If you're coming at me, then hurry up. I won't lose!
Hehehe...HAHAHAHA! Well, fine.
With all my love, I'll go easy on you. Here I come!
Puyo battle!
Hm... As expected of my fiancée.
Stop getting the wrong idea already!
Arly, I'm heading off first.
I'll be waiting for you at our sweet home♪
Doing this and that, we'll have all the fun in the world! MWAHAHAHAHA!
Ah— HEY, WAAAIT!
Geez, he's always like this. And he didn't even tell me where to go.
Aah, looks like I don't have a choice...
He'll bother everyone at this rate.
Guess it can't be helped. How 'bout we teach him a lesson? Right, Carby?
Guuguguu!
Hm... So I said, but...
Satan's castle... Where is it, even?
Gugu~?
AH—! Found Arle!
Eh? Who?
I won't let ya say you've forgotten me!
I'm the half-dragon beauty who's a beast at Puyo, Draco Centauros!
I-I do remember, okay...?
Long time no see~
Ah, right, Draco! Have you seen anything like
a totally tasteless, useless, obnoxious castle surrounded by a raging storm nearby?
Yeah, it's brand new.
Really?! Tell me where it is!
Hm...
I'll tell ya if you win against me in a Beauty Puyo battle!
I don't mind Puyo battles, but...
What does winning in "Beauty Puyo" mean?! Don't you mean "beauty contest"?
Here I gooo!
She's not listening to me at all...
It's a Puyo battle!
Gwaaarrr...
I lost to Arrrrle...!
Now, tell me. Where is that castle?
I think it's past the forest, near the edge of the wild...
But...
I'm not gonna lose next time, ya hear?!
Ah, she left.
Well, whatever. I know where to go.
Let's head off, Carby!
Gu-guguuu!
Wh-what do I do...
I got lost and now I'm at the ocean...
Gu...
Hey hey! Ain't that Arle?
Hm? That voice is...
It's the freshest dancing king, Suketoudara!
What's wrong? Didn't'cha come here to dance with me?
Nope, I didn't.
I'm lost and really confused.
Salmon need a helping fin?
Really?!
If ya got somewhere ya wanna go, LET'S DANCE!
If ya keep on vibin' as ya dance, it'll be a b-reef journey~!
Sorry, I was wrong to hope for anything useful.
What didja say...? Are ya sayin' ya can't dance to the king's beat?!
Geez! I don't have time for that right now!
Glub glub glub... In that case...
If I beat ya in Puyo, you betta join me in all night dancin'!
Haah... How annoying...
ARE YOU READY? LET'S!
PUYO BATTLE!
Glub-ub-bub... Holy mackerel...
Alright, let's take this chance and...
...run, Carby!
Guguguu!
WAAAAIT!
Ugh...
Thanks to Suketoudara, I've ended up at some gloomy cave.
What did you just call gloomy?
UWAH?! Someone's here!
Hmph... Arle. So you've approached me,
the Dark Wizard Schezo, first...
Today, I'll be sure to take you!
Geh, I've run into yet another annoying person...
Not to mention, you're still saying perverted things.
D-don't call me a pervert!
I just want your magic powers!
Yes, yes, I know.
I'll neeever give them to an annoying pervert, okay?
TOOOOO BAD.
GUUUUU-GU.
Hmph. Fine.
I'll take you, even if I have to use force.
Just try it!
Here we go...
It's a Puyo battle!
M...mortifying......!
Well, that was fun in its own way, Schezo.
Oh yeah, on that note, have you seen some kind of tasteless castle anywhere?
I do feel like I've seen something like that... What's it to you?
Well, that castle was built by Satan...
What, Satan?
I was thinking of going to teach him a lesson after this.
What?! In that case, I'm coming too.
Eh? You don't need to come.
Before I hold you in my arms, I cannot allow anyone else to defeat you.
Uh... I'll be fine, so... Schezo, you should just take a nice break, okay?
We shall be paired together!
Yeah, yeah. "Paired with your magic", right?
Guh...!
I can finally see Satan's castle!
Ho~hohoho! To trek all that way and end up here, what a terrible, terrible fool.
I, Witch, will not allow y'all to take one more step!
Therefore, I will be serving as your opponent. Battle me!
Ack, Witch!
What's with you all of a sudden?!
I haven't a clue why,
but whenever I find Miss Arle, I get a hankerin' to interfere!
Is... Is that so...
Oh? Today, the perv-ish wizard is with you.
Where y'all headed?
Don't call me a per-vert!
Schezo, that's enough...
I was just gonna go give Satan a piece of my mind,
so I'm heading over to that tasteless castle over there.
My my, to call it "tasteless"...
It's a mighty fine castle I say, being all spooky-like.
Her taste is out of this world...
Anywho, if y'all wish to venture onward, then...
We'll have to battle, yeah?
I shall be your opponent!
UNUSED
Ow-ouch...
I did it! It's my win!
Right then, you may pass.
You don't even own this road.
Just a little bit further!
Ah, Carby?!
Where are you going, Carbuncle?
Gugu...
Eh— How is this boring?!
Gu-guguuu!
Why do you wanna go back?!
Is that so... Leave it be. Let's go.
You go ahead first, Schezo.
I want to go with Carby.
Gugu~!
Alright~! Come at me~!
Gugu-guguugu!
Ahh~ That was fun!
Gugu~!
Looks like Carby had fun too.
Sheesh, you two sure get along...
Yeah!
Everything's fun if Carby's with me!
Gu-gugu~!
As I thought, you've appeared.
Rulue!
Arle!
I'll never let you get close to Darling Satan!
The one who will become his queen is me!
As always, you only care about Satan.
Just what about him is attractive...
Oi, Arle. Don't fan the flames.
Though, it is true that finding that troublesome,
delusional old man attractive requires an extremely, absurdly,
pathetically bad taste.
Hey, you're clearly the one fanning the flames, you know!
...... I won't forgive...
EITHER OF YOU!!
FEEL THE WRATH OF THE QUEEN'S FIST!!
If I win, I'm going through, okay, Rulue?
UNUSED
Uwah! She's super mad!
Don't worry, Rulue. I'm not gonna be his queen.
Be at ease. I'll never hand Arle over to that old man.
Eh— Ah— You...hold it!
GRAAAAAH!!! HOW INFURIATING!!
Arle! You did come, after all!
And Carbunny's also with you♪
Guu...
Now, come this way! Let's have our starlit honeymoon!★
Bleh... As I thought, this place is full of tasteless rooms.
This is beyond ridiculous and delusional.
What, Schezo? You came as well?
I won't give Arle to you.
As always, you never know your place.
Arle belongs to me, the Great Satan!
ARGH...! Cut it out!
I don't belong to either of you two!
The reason I bothered to come here is
to put an end to the trouble Satan's made!
Oh? Are you still embarrassed?♪
If I can't get through to you with words,
then I'll beat it into you through a Puyo battle!
Mwahahaha! Come, Arly!
It's a Puyo battle!
IMPOSSIBLE! H-how could I...
Now, Satan.
Destroy this castle immediately and return everything to as it was!
Hmph. Done deluding yourself?
N—
NO WAAAAAAAY!!!
Hehehehee.
I found someone with a ton of power!
How nice~
I want it~
If I took that old man's power...
I'd have so much fun~!
Heheheheheee...
